Vigilance
[i]Spiritual Leader [/i]– Noncreature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
[i]Flare[/i] – Whenever a noncreature source you control deals damage, you gain that much life.
[i]Focus[/i] – Whenever Sanaki, Begnion's Apostle, attacks and isn't blocked, create a copy of target enchantment you control.
